scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run typecheck
scripts.android: npm run build && cd android && rm -rf build app/build && cd - && react-native run-android --port 7082
scripts.android:clean: npm run build && cd android && rm -rf build app/build .gradle && ./gradlew clean && cd - && react-native run-android --port 7082
scripts.android:install:debug: npm run build && cd android && rm -rf build app/build .gradle && ./gradlew clean && cd - && react-native run-android --mode=debug --port 7082
scripts.android:install:release: npm run build && cd android && rm -rf build app/build .gradle && ./gradlew clean && cd - && react-native run-android --mode=release --port 7082
scripts.ios: npm run build && bash -c 'react-native run-ios --mode Debug --port 7082 --simulator "${1:-iPhone 17 Pro}"' _
scripts.ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock build .xcuserdata && bundle exec pod install && cd - && npm run ios
scripts.ios:install:debug: npm run build && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock build .xcuserdata && bundle exec pod install && cd - && react-native run-ios --mode Debug --port 7082 --device
scripts.ios:install:release: npm run build && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock build .xcuserdata && bundle exec pod install && cd - && react-native run-ios --mode Release --port 7082 --device
